Params: {3: 'Babylonia, F.O.S. Military Command College, Connection Lab'}
{3: 'In the dark space, all Langston can see is his own reflection and the warning screen, blinking in red.'}
{3: "The connection rate doesn't increase no matter what he does. He poured his heart and soul into this, following the plan, but received nothing in return."}
{3: 'Without results, the whole process meant nothing.'}
{3: 'The pain bites at his nerves, rippling outward.'}
{3: 'His skull is trembling, ears ringing, teeth chattering.'}
{2: 'Connection System', 3: 'W A R N I N G'}
{2: 'Connection System', 3: 'S E C O N D W A R N I N G'}
{3: 'Please break the memory connection immediately. If you exceed your connection threshold, memory loss may occur!'}
{3: 'And then he gets used to it.'}
{3: 'Smith. The perfect monster. The only correct answer.'}
{3: '"A mixture: A material made up of two or more different Chemical substances which are not chemically combined."'}
{3: '"A concrete object made of materials and information, whose borders are continuously constructed and reconstructed."'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Langston wakes up on the bed of a first-class private ward to a doctor tending to him. On the communications screen, his father—Mr. Smith—flashes into sight.'}
{3: 'Langston instinctively extends his hand, and then, suddenly, as if realizing something, retracts it and bows.'}
{2: 'John', 3: 'I have to talk to your doctor, just the two of us.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'John', 3: "You heard Langston, Doctor. He said he's fine.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: '...According to the medical system examination, all physical signs of the patient are normal. His activity should not be affected.'}

{2: 'Doctor', 3: 'On my report, I\'ll write "the exterior damage has been processed with medical equipment. Luckily the connection was just a test. Though the damage to his consciousness is irreversible, his daily activities should not be impeded."'}
